name: 10 games for BTOB
description:
A tribute game for BTOB - features 10 casual games in 1:
*** Chibi Drive: Drive the chibi with your finger
*** Lanes: Play with both hands at same time
*** Dual: Two chibi move across
*** ZicZac: Go left or right - you call
*** Ticking: Reaction game - tap when the clock hand point a chibi
*** Highway: Swipe left right to keep the path
*** Song Guess: Guess the name of song
*** Name Check: Check a name is right or wrong
*** Music Cocktaik: Chaos sounds
*** The Ring: Keep the ring go thought the zig zag line
